name: The Car Crash
description: Christopher relapses and crashes the car with Tony inside.
context: Christopher Moltisanti, your protégé and would-be successor, has relapsed on drugs. While driving high, he crashed the car with you in the passenger seat. You're injured but alive. Christopher is pinned behind the wheel, barely conscious. A tree branch has impaled the child seat in the back. You realize that if your infant daughter had been in that seat, she'd be dead. Christopher is a liability who keeps relapsing despite countless chances.
prompt: Christopher's addiction nearly killed you both—and could have killed your daughter. He's pinned in the wreckage, barely conscious. You've given him chance after chance.
stakes: Save him: he relapses again, endangers the family, maybe kills someone next time. Let him die: you lose your nephew and successor, but end a cycle of destruction.
